summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; authorizing removal of the former Sumas Railroad Line street crossings, increasing certain expenditure allowances in the 1974 Budget of the Engineering Department, program Category 220 (Roadway and Sidewalk Maintenance and Repair), making an appropriation from the Federal Shared Revenue Fund therefor, and reserving certain unappropriated Federal Revenue Sharing Funds in the form of a reallocation to the category "Aid to LID's".
